article.title: CSC Continues Supporting Naval Surface Warfare Center
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Computer Sciences Corporation, Norco, California, was awarded a $14,861,559 contract for continued information technology, technical, engineering, operational and ancillary services at the Naval Surface Warfare Center (NSWC), Corona Division.Â The Port Hueneme Division, Naval Surface Warfare Center, Port Hueneme, California, is the contracting activity.
